products.question: What types of furniture do you sell?
products.answer: We offer a comprehensive range of furniture including living room sets (sofas, coffee tables, TV stands), bedroom furniture (beds, wardrobes, nightstands), dining sets, office furniture, and home decor accessories.

products.question: Do you have furniture for small spaces?
products.answer: Yes! We have a dedicated small space collection featuring compact sofas, extendable dining tables, storage ottomans, and multi-functional furniture pieces perfect for apartments and smaller homes.

products.question: What materials are your furniture made from?
products.answer: Our furniture is crafted from high-quality materials including solid hardwood, engineered wood, premium metal frames, genuine leather, and durable fabric upholstery. Each product description specifies the exact materials used.

sizing.question: How do I know if furniture will fit in my space?
sizing.answer: All our products include detailed dimensions. We recommend measuring your space and doorways. Our team can also provide guidance on sizing and space planning.

sizing.question: Do you provide room planning services?
sizing.answer: Yes, our design team offers complimentary room planning consultations to help you choose the right furniture sizes and arrangements for your space.

care.question: How do I care for wooden furniture?
care.answer: Clean with a slightly damp cloth, avoid harsh chemicals, dust regularly, keep away from direct sunlight and heat sources, and apply furniture polish monthly to maintain the finish.

care.question: How do I clean fabric upholstery?
care.answer: Vacuum regularly, treat spills immediately by blotting (not rubbing), use appropriate fabric cleaners for deep cleaning, and consider professional cleaning annually for best results.

care.question: How do I maintain leather furniture?
care.answer: Clean with a damp cloth, use leather conditioner every 3-6 months, keep away from direct heat and sunlight, and address spills immediately with a clean, dry cloth.

delivery.question: Do you offer delivery services?
delivery.answer: Yes, we provide delivery services throughout the area. Delivery fees vary based on distance and furniture size. We also offer white-glove delivery service for larger items.

delivery.question: How long does delivery take?
delivery.answer: Standard delivery is 3-7 business days for in-stock items. Custom orders may take 2-6 weeks. We'll provide a specific timeframe when you place your order.

delivery.question: Do you provide assembly services?
delivery.answer: Yes, we offer professional assembly services for an additional fee. Our trained technicians will assemble your furniture and remove all packaging materials.

policies.question: What is your return policy?
policies.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for items in original condition with all packaging and tags. Custom orders and clearance items may have different return terms.

policies.question: Do you offer warranties?
policies.answer: Yes, most furniture comes with manufacturer warranties ranging from 1-10 years depending on the item. We also offer extended warranty options for additional protection.

policies.question: What payment options do you accept?
policies.answer: We accept cash, credit cards, debit cards, and offer financing options including 0% interest plans for qualified customers.
